component.name: Dune Dynasty
component.summary: A dune 2 Remake using the reverse engineered code

description.p: _Dune Dynasty_ is an enhancement of the classic real-time strategy game _Dune II_ by Westwood Studios. It's goal is to make _Dune II_ playable on modern systems with additional features, bugfixes and QoL-improvements. It is not a remake. It builds upon the original game engine as reverse-engineered by the OpenDUNE project.
